attributes.action: Null and Void any Asylum Claim  through illegal entry into the United Kingdom
attributes.background: Therefore all asylum claims should have  no legal force or effect by entering the United Kingdom illegally and should therefore be deported immediately without legal status to the safe country they have left , or repatriated to there home country immediately !

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Detain all migrants that enter the UK illegally
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709445
